revised_title: Explaining the Differences between Sepia and Vermes Testacea Ova
tldr: The author, Everard Home, discusses the differences between the ova of Sepia and Vermes Testacea, which live in water. He explains that the ova of Sepia are not the same as those of the animals found in the Argonauta shell. The author also describes the process of shell formation in these animals and the differences in their reproductive systems.
